body: The animal companion flutters wildly around any enemy it would normally attack with the attack trick. It makes an attack roll against that enemy. On a hit, the enemy is shaken for 1 round. This ability replaces wild empathy.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Falconer/Feathered Companion/Distract (DC 20; bird only)
name: Distract (DC 20; bird only)
